attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To stop all immigration and give this country,ie,uk back to the British People!

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop all immigration."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11464.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/britain/
